name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScreenApp - Record and take AI notes of meetings, videos, calls & lectures

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily record your screen and audio with ScreenApp. Take AI Notes and summaries of any recording.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScreenApp enables you to transcribe audio and screen content directly from your browser or any URL. It's useful for note-taking and summarizing content from lectures, meetings, webinars, podcasts, and more.

✨ Features:

📝 Transcriptions: Convert audio and video content into text.
🌐 Browser-Based Access: No need for downloads or installations.
🔗 URL Support: Transcribe content from accessible web links.
📓 Note-Taking Aid: Create notes from various multimedia sources.
🧠 Summarization: Generate summaries of transcribed content.

⚡ Benefits:

⏱️ Time-Saving: Automates transcription to reduce manual effort.
📂 Organization: Keep transcribed content in one accessible location.
🤝 Collaboration: Share transcriptions with others when needed.

🚀 How to Use:

1️⃣ Install ScreenApp in your browser.
2️⃣ Open the application and select the content to transcribe.
3️⃣ Initiate the transcription process.
4️⃣ Access and utilize the transcribed text as required.
